name: @graphistry/client-api
description: Client-side API for interacting with a Graphistry embedded visualization.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:js:full && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js-core && npm run build:js-aliases
scripts.build:js-core: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:iife && npm run build:iife-raw
scripts.build:js-aliases: cp dist/index.esm.min.js dist/index.min.mjs && cp dist/index.esm.min.js.map dist/index.min.mjs.map
scripts.build:js:full: npm run build:js-core:full && npm run build:js-core:min:full && npm run build:js-aliases:full && npm run build:js-aliases:min:full
scripts.build:js-core:full: npm run build:cjs:full && npm run build:esm:full && npm run build:iife:full
scripts.build:js-aliases:full: npm run build:js-aliases:full-esm && npm run build:js-aliases:full-rest
scripts.build:js-aliases:full-esm: cp dist/index.full.esm.js dist/index.full.mjs && cp dist/index.full.esm.js.map dist/index.full.mjs.map
scripts.build:js-aliases:full-rest: cp dist/index.full.iife.js dist/GraphistryJS.js && cp dist/index.full.iife.js.map dist/GraphistryJS.js.map
scripts.build:js-core:min:full: npm run build:cjs:min:full && npm run build:esm:min:full && npm run build:iife:min:full
scripts.build:js-aliases:min:full: npm run build:js-aliases:min:full-esm && npm run build:js-aliases:min:full-rest
scripts.build:js-aliases:min:full-esm: cp dist/index.full.esm.min.js dist/index.full.min.mjs && cp dist/index.full.esm.min.js.map dist/index.full.min.mjs.map
scripts.build:js-aliases:min:full-rest: cp dist/index.full.iife.min.js dist/GraphistryJS.min.js && cp dist/index.full.iife.min.js.map dist/GraphistryJS.min.js.map && cp dist/index.full.iife.js dist/GraphistryJS.js && cp dist/index.full.iife.js.map dist/GraphistryJS.js.map
scripts.build:docs: rimraf docs && mkdir -p docs && jsdoc -c jsdoc-conf.json -R ./README.md -d docs
scripts.clean: npm run clean:install && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:docs

author: Graphistry, Inc <https://graphistry.com>
